languages.text: {n}Эвейн улыбается.{/n} "Лишь потому, что церемонии еще не было. Ты ведь тоже успел{mf||а} свершить многое до того, как официально объявил{mf||а} о наследовании. Я принял бразды правления династией — хоть это, увы, и не стало бескровным восхождением. Но до празднований ли, когда мой протекторат погибает? Я приглашу тебя на церемонию, когда ты вернешься, а мои люди перестанут умирать чудовищной смертью".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эвейн улыбается.{/n} "Лишь потому, что церемонии еще не было. Ты ведь тоже успел{mf||а} свершить многое до того, как официально объявил{mf||а} о наследовании. Я принял бразды правления династией — хоть это, увы, и не стало бескровным восхождением. Но до празднований ли, когда мой протекторат погибает? Я приглашу тебя на церемонию, когда ты вернешься, а мои люди перестанут умирать чудовищной смертью".
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "That is merely because the ceremony has yet to be held. You had done quite a bit as well before you officially announced yourself as heir. I have taken the dynastic reins of power — though, unfortunately, my ascent was not a bloodless one. But now is no time to celebrate. My protectorate stands to perish. I will invite you to my ceremony once you have returned, and my people are no longer suffering terrifying deaths."

Я приглашу тебя на церемонию, когда ты вернешься, а мои люди перестанут умирать чудовищной смертью".

languages.text: {n}Evayne sonríe.{/n} «Eso se debe sencillamente a que la ceremonia no se ha celebrado aún. Usted también había hecho mucho antes de autoproclamarse oficialmente como {mf|heredero|heredera}. Yo he tomado las riendas dinásticas del poder; aunque lamentablemente mi ascensión no ha sido incruenta. Pero ahora no es momento de celebraciones. Mi protectorado está al borde de la aniquilación. Le invitaré a mi ceremonia cuando haya regresado y mis súbditos ya no corran el riesgo de sufrir muertes espantosas».
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "That is merely because the ceremony has yet to be held. You had done quite a bit as well before you officially announced yourself as heir. I have taken the dynastic reins of power — though, unfortunately, my ascent was not a bloodless one. But now is no time to celebrate. My protectorate stands to perish. I will invite you to my ceremony once you have returned, and my people are no longer suffering terrifying deaths."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne sonríe.{/n} «Eso se debe sencillamente a que la ceremonia no se ha celebrado aún. Usted también había hecho mucho antes de autoproclamarse oficialmente como {mf|heredero|heredera}. Yo he tomado las riendas dinásticas del poder; aunque lamentablemente mi ascensión no ha sido incruenta. Pero ahora no es momento de celebraciones. Mi protectorado está al borde de la aniquilación. Le invitaré a mi ceremonia cuando haya regresado y mis súbditos ya no corran el riesgo de sufrir muertes espantosas».
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}艾维尼微笑道。{/n}“因为颂典还没开始举行呢。您在正式宣布自己是王朝继承人前，就已经成就了无数壮举。我确实接过了王朝的权力缰绳，但遗憾的是，我的继任过程并非和平交接。而且，我的王朝正濒临灭亡的边缘，现在还不是庆祝的时候。等您回来之后，我就会邀请您参加我的继任颂典。届时，我的人民也不会再面临死亡的可怕威胁了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "That is merely because the ceremony has yet to be held. You had done quite a bit as well before you officially announced yourself as heir. I have taken the dynastic reins of power — though, unfortunately, my ascent was not a bloodless one. But now is no time to celebrate. My protectorate stands to perish. I will invite you to my ceremony once you have returned, and my people are no longer suffering terrifying deaths."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾维尼微笑道。{/n}“因为颂典还没开始举行呢。您在正式宣布自己是王朝继承人前，就已经成就了无数壮举。我确实接过了王朝的权力缰绳，但遗憾的是，我的继任过程并非和平交接。而且，我的王朝正濒临灭亡的边缘，现在还不是庆祝的时候。等您回来之后，我就会邀请您参加我的继任颂典。届时，我的人民也不会再面临死亡的可怕威胁了。”
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}Evayne sourit.{/n} « C'est tout simplement parce que la cérémonie n'a pas encore eu lieu. Vous avez vous-même accompli beaucoup de choses avant d'annoncer officiellement que vous étiez l'{mf|héritier|héritière}. Certes, j'ai pris les rênes de ma dynastie, même si mon avènement ne s'est pas fait sans effusion de sang... mais l'heure n'est pas aux célébrations, mon protectorat est en péril. Je vous inviterai à ma cérémonie lorsque vous serez {mf|revenu|revenue} et que mon peuple aura cessé de se faire ignominieusement massacrer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "That is merely because the ceremony has yet to be held. You had done quite a bit as well before you officially announced yourself as heir. I have taken the dynastic reins of power — though, unfortunately, my ascent was not a bloodless one. But now is no time to celebrate. My protectorate stands to perish. I will invite you to my ceremony once you have returned, and my people are no longer suffering terrifying deaths."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne sourit.{/n} « C'est tout simplement parce que la cérémonie n'a pas encore eu lieu. Vous avez vous-même accompli beaucoup de choses avant d'annoncer officiellement que vous étiez l'{mf|héritier|héritière}. Certes, j'ai pris les rênes de ma dynastie, même si mon avènement ne s'est pas fait sans effusion de sang... mais l'heure n'est pas aux célébrations, mon protectorat est en péril. Je vous inviterai à ma cérémonie lorsque vous serez {mf|revenu|revenue} et que mon peuple aura cessé de se faire ignominieusement massacrer. »
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}エヴァインは微笑む。{/n}「それは儀式が未だ行われていないだけだ。継承者であることを正式に表明する前に、あなたも色々なことをやってきただろう。私は王朝の権力の手綱を握った…とはいえ、残念なことに、その道程は無血ではなかった。しかし、今は祝うべき時ではない。私の保護領は滅びようとしている。あなたが戻り、私の民が恐ろしい死に苦しまないようになったら、私の儀式に招待しよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "That is merely because the ceremony has yet to be held. You had done quite a bit as well before you officially announced yourself as heir. I have taken the dynastic reins of power — though, unfortunately, my ascent was not a bloodless one. But now is no time to celebrate. My protectorate stands to perish. I will invite you to my ceremony once you have returned, and my people are no longer suffering terrifying deaths."

traits.locale_text: {n}エヴァインは微笑む。{/n}「それは儀式が未だ行われていないだけだ。継承者であることを正式に表明する前に、あなたも色々なことをやってきただろう。私は王朝の権力の手綱を握った…とはいえ、残念なことに、その道程は無血ではなかった。しかし、今は祝うべき時ではない。私の保護領は滅びようとしている。あなたが戻り、私の民が恐ろしい死に苦しまないようになったら、私の儀式に招待しよう」
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}Evayne lächelt.{/n} "Das liegt allein daran, dass die Zeremonie noch nicht stattgefunden hat. Auch Ihr selbst habt viel getan, bevor Ihr Euch offiziell {mf|zum Erben|zur Erbin} erklärt habt. Ich habe die dynastischen Zügel der Macht übernehmen ... auch wenn mein Aufstieg leider kein blutloser war. Doch das ist nicht der richtige Augenblick zum Feiern. Mein Protektorat steht vor der Vernichtung. Ich lade Euch zu meiner Zeremonie ein, wenn Ihr zurückgekehrt seid und mein Volk nicht länger grauenhafte Tode stirbt."
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "That is merely because the ceremony has yet to be held. You had done quite a bit as well before you officially announced yourself as heir. I have taken the dynastic reins of power — though, unfortunately, my ascent was not a bloodless one. But now is no time to celebrate. My protectorate stands to perish. I will invite you to my ceremony once you have returned, and my people are no longer suffering terrifying deaths."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne lächelt.{/n} "Das liegt allein daran, dass die Zeremonie noch nicht stattgefunden hat. Auch Ihr selbst habt viel getan, bevor Ihr Euch offiziell {mf|zum Erben|zur Erbin} erklärt habt. Ich habe die dynastischen Zügel der Macht übernehmen ... auch wenn mein Aufstieg leider kein blutloser war. Doch das ist nicht der richtige Augenblick zum Feiern. Mein Protektorat steht vor der Vernichtung. Ich lade Euch zu meiner Zeremonie ein, wenn Ihr zurückgekehrt seid und mein Volk nicht länger grauenhafte Tode stirbt."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}Evayne gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bunun sebebi, merasimin henüz yapılmamış olmasıdır. Sen vârisliğini duyurmadan önce oldukça fazla şey başarmıştın. Bense hanedanlığın güç iplerini elime aldım ama maalesef ki yükselişim kanlı oldu. Şimdi kutlamanın vakti değil. Protektoram yıkımın eşiğinde. Geri döndüğünde, halkım korkunç ölümlerle cebelleşmediğinde seni merasimime davet edeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne smiles.{/n} "That is merely because the ceremony has yet to be held. You had done quite a bit as well before you officially announced yourself as heir. I have taken the dynastic reins of power — though, unfortunately, my ascent was not a bloodless one. But now is no time to celebrate. My protectorate stands to perish. I will invite you to my ceremony once you have returned, and my people are no longer suffering terrifying deaths."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bunun sebebi, seremoninin henüz yapılmamış olmasıdır. Kendini resmî vâris olarak duyurmadan önce oldukça fazla şey başarmıştın. Hanedanlığın güç iplerini elime aldım ama maalesef ki yükselişim kanlı oldu. Şimdi kutlamanın vakti değil. Protektoram yok oluyor. Geri döndüğünde ve halkım korkunç ölümlerle cebelleşmediğinde seni seremonime davet edeceğim."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final
